name: Forgive my Sins, Father
description:
You play as a priest. One day, a young man comes into the confessional and asks for forgiveness. The sins start off small but they will eventually grow bigger. He seeks your advice. Whether he turns into a serial killer or a good family man is up to you. Regardless of the outcome, he will yearn for you... He will always be watching you...

Will you save him or let him fall into the pits of darkness?


4 different Endings and CGs.

Around 5K words so maybe 30 minutes playtime.

Hint feature to unlock other endings after completing an ending.

CONTENT WARNING:

There will be no mentions of God or similar names, as I wish to avoid using them.

This work is fictional and is not meant to harm any religion or religious figure.

Mentions of abuse, murder, adultery

NOT SUITABLE FOR CHILDREN OR THOSE WHO ARE EASILY DISTURBED

Credit to Dova Syndrome(https://dova-s.jp/) for Music and Zapsplat(https://www.zapsplat.com/) for Sound Effects.
